name: minotaurs-unleashed
title: Minotaurs Unleashed
description: The minotaurs of Golarion are a powerful and brave band of people who have been overlooked by many over the years, considered by the common folk to be nothing more than violent monsters and worshippers of the demon lord Baphomet. What many donâ€™t know however, is that there are a number of diverse minotaur cultures across Golarion that seek a different path and have long since forged their own destiny. If you wish to play a powerful and cunning ancestry with a complex and untold history, Minotaurs Unleashed is for you!

minotaur.label: Minotaur
minotaur.description: A weapon with this trait is created and used by minotaurs.

minotaur.label: Minotaur
minotaur.description: A creature with this trait is a member of the minotaur ancestry. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by minotaurs. A weapon with this trait is created and used by minotaurs.
